tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AdultLearnersAttendance (
    learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workshop_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    attendance_status VARCHAR(50),
    participation_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE AdultLearners (
  learner_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Workshops (
  workshop_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  date TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  facilitator_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Attendance (
  attendance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  learner_id UUID REFERENCES AdultLearners(learner_id),
  workshop_id UUID REFERENCES Workshops(workshop_id),
  attendance_date DATE,
  participation_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE adult_learners (
    learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE workshops (
    workshop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workshop_name TEXT,
    date DATE,
    location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_type TEXT,
    date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT REFERENCES adult_learners(learner_id),
    workshop_id INT REFERENCES workshops(workshop_id),
    event_id INT REFERENCES events(event_id),
    attendance_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AdultLearners (
    learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Workshops (
    workshop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workshop_name VARCHAR(50),
    workshop_date DATE,
    workshop_location VARCHAR(100),
    instructor_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT,
    workshop_id INT,
    attendance_date DATE,
    is_present BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    event_date DATE,
    event_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Participation (
    participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    participation_date DATE,
    participation_notes VARCHAR(255)
)
